name: Planet Bash
description: Save the environment and get rid of those pesky humans, bash and destroy their buildings to bring peace to Earth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 1.2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: none Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 2GHz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 Storage: 100 MB available space
